original_text: or the sin which he has committed is made known to him, he shall bring as his offering a goat, a male without blemish,
korean_text: 그가 범한 죄를 누가 그에게 깨우쳐 주면 그는 흠 없는 숫염소를 예물로 가져다가

sentences.original_text: or the sin which he has committed is made known to him
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그가 범한 죄가 그에게 알려지면

sentences.original_text: he shall bring as his offering a goat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 제물로 수염소를 가져와야 하리니
